Epoch 11: 2%|‚ñè | 66/2775 [02:00<1:22:17, 1.82s/it, loss=2.367, v_num=1, train_loss=2.36, train_acc=1.67, val_loss=2.41, val_acc=1.27] <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
